channel.title: Player Bonuses
channel.description:
Ok, How can i make, that when someone connects to my server, they will have 120 bonuses for everything. And also, if they would take their armor off. It will stay at 120. So anything they will wear, it will be 120 and not go up or go down.. How can i do this? Here's what im talking about. [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2vuj9jm.jpg[/img]
I'll explain. Everything in the yellow boxes, I want it to be 120. It shouldnt matter what i wear, but i want it to be 120. So how can i do this?

item.title: Player Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @bcdutton bcdutton
item.description:
@bcdutton wrote:

Look in player class for

	public int playerBonus[] = new int[12];

Work from there

Read full topic

item.title: Player Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

Yep, I would devide 11 Items by 120, which i would give 10 bonuses for each item…
But, How would i make it where if u have no armor on, your bonuses are 120?

Read full topic

item.title: Player Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Yer and when you have 2 pieces of armour it would be the 120+120 which is 240 I believe…

Read full topic

item.title: Player Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

Lol, I was thinking about that. But what about when i dont have no armor
on? I want it to be 120 too

Read full topic

item.title: Player Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

In your item.cfg change every piece there to 120 for every item…

(Roughly 8000 items).

That should keep ya busy.

Read full topic
